component.name: ScreenCloud
component.summary: Easy to use screenshot sharing application

description.p: Take a screenshot using one of the 3 hotkeys or simply click the ScreenCloud tray icon. You can choose where you want to save your screenshot. Several cloud services as well as local storage is supported. A built-in screenshot editor lets you annotate your screenshots to highlight the important parts!

ul.li: Open Source and cross-platform(Windows, Mac & Linux)
Fast and easy: Snap a photo, paste the link, done!
Plugin support, save to Dropbox, Imgur, etc
